title: Strongly-confined colloidal lead-halide perovskite quantum dots: from synthesis to applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00077C, Tutorial Review
Open Access

Junzhi Ye, Deepika Gaur, Chenjia Mi, Zijian Chen, Iago López Fernández, Haitao Zhao, Yitong Dong, Lakshminarayana Polavarapu, Robert L. Z. Hoye
Reducing the dimensionality of lead-halide perovskite nanocrystals from 3D to 0D leads to fascinating properties. This tutorial review discusses the synthesis, optical properties and applications of such strongly-confined quantum dots.
